docs.title: Welcome to AI BUILDERS
docs.text: At AI BUILDERS, we empower innovators, developers, and businesses to unleash their potential by building on Azure. This is your space to explore, create, and grow with cutting-edge technology, all while having fun along the way.

docs.title: Part 1: Build SOTA Architectures
docs.text: Begin your journey with state-of-the-art architectures that showcase the possibilities of Azure. From real-time AI-powered solutions to innovative applications, ignite your creativity with the best in tech.

docs.title: Part 2: Create Horizontal Foundations
docs.text: Dive deeper into scalable, flexible architectures that solve universal challenges. Learn to leverage Azure’s advanced tools like DSPy and GraphRAG to create reusable, robust solutions for any industry.

docs.title: Part 3: Design Vertical Solutions
docs.text:
Collaborate to build tailored MVPs that address specific industry needs. These solutions not only solve today’s problems but provide a foundation for future growth, empowering you to extend and innovate on Azure.

Whether you’re here to explore the latest in tech or to build solutions that scale, BuildWithAzure is your destination to turn ideas into impactful outcomes. Join us and start building today!

docs.title: Part 1: Build SOTA Architectures
docs.text: Begin your journey by creating state-of-the-art architectures that redefine what's possible. With Azure, explore real-time AI, cutting-edge applications, and advanced automation to bring your most innovative ideas to life. Let’s ignite your creativity and build the future, today.

docs.title: Hyper-personalised Customer Support Call Center
docs.text: Transform customer experiences with an intelligent, multi-modal agent powered by Azure OpenA real-time API and Azure AI Foundry Agents, delivering real-time, tailored support that feels personal, seamless, and unforgettable.

docs.title: Automated Video Storytelling Agent with Magentic-One
docs.text: Magentic-One, a generalist multi-agent system from Microsoft-research, brings stories to life, turning text into stunning videos with vivid visuals, captivating narration, and immersive sound—empowering creators to inspire and engage effortlessly.

docs.title: Part 2: Create Horizontal Foundations
docs.text: Master the art of building scalable and adaptable architectures that solve universal challenges. Utilize Azure’s powerful tools like DSPy and GraphRAG to design robust, reusable solutions, laying the groundwork for transformative innovation across industries.

docs.title: Graph RAG on Azure
docs.text: Ground your context with Knowledge Graphs on Azure

docs.title: DSPy on Azure
docs.text: Build optimised prompt flows with reasoning on Azure OpenAI

docs.title: Part 3: Design Vertical Solutions
docs.text: Collaborate with Azure to craft tailored MVPs that address industry-specific challenges. Build impactful solutions designed for today’s needs while setting the stage for future growth, scalability, and success. Your innovation starts here.

docs.title: Recommender Systems with multimodal RAG for e-commerce
docs.text: Traditional search methods often limit customers to finding products through text-based product descriptions.Embed3 transforms this search experience. Retailers can build applications which search product images in addition to text descriptions, creating a diﬀerentiated experience for shoppers and improving conversion rates.

docs.title: Demand forecasting with TimeGen - Transformer-based forecasting model
